channel.title: Server status 99%?
channel.description:
Hey,
I slept over night and my server status went to 99%, no idea why. So is it able to get back to 100%? If so.. WHEN??

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Oneinch, post:8, topic:406312”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=503309.msg3682946#msg3682946 date=1311646106]
I mean statistically, there is no way to ever reach exactly 100% again, but since I don’t show decimal points, when your uptime gets to 99.5% or above, it is rounded up to 100%.

As to when it happens, there is no way I can tell you, as it depends how long you have been on the server status page, but if it only went down 1% over-night it shouldn’t be all that long.
[/quote]

Theres something wrong in this, my server wasn’t even offline and the status went to 98%…[/quote]

So obviously it was offline for a time.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @Oneinch Oneinch
item.description:
@Oneinch wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:406312”]I mean statistically, there is no way to ever reach exactly 100% again, but since I don’t show decimal points, when your uptime gets to 99.5% or above, it is rounded up to 100%.

As to when it happens, there is no way I can tell you, as it depends how long you have been on the server status page, but if it only went down 1% over-night it shouldn’t be all that long.[/quote]

Theres something wrong in this, my server wasn’t even offline and the status went to 98%…

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I mean statistically, there is no way to ever reach exactly 100% again, but since I don’t show decimal points, when your uptime gets to 99.5% or above, it is rounded up to 100%.

As to when it happens, there is no way I can tell you, as it depends how long you have been on the server status page, but if it only went down 1% over-night it shouldn’t be all that long.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @clx3 clx3
item.description:
@clx3 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It will eventually go back up to 100% due to a rounding error.

What means rounding error? and when does it go back? Thanks for replying btw :)!

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It will eventually go back up to 100% due to a rounding error.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Nope. If the server was online for 100 minutes, and offline for 1, it gets rounded up to 100%.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @clx3 clx3
item.description:
@clx3 wrote:

REALLY? it doesn’t go back to 100% from 99%… like few months ago when i had my old server it did go back to 100 from 99, has this been changed?

Read full topic

item.title: Server status 99%?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Nope. There’s a topic on this, you’ll have to wait and re-submit it.

Read full topic
